quote: Knowing yourself is the beginning of all wisdom.
author: Aristotle

quote: It is the mark of an educated mind to be able to entertain a thought without accepting it.
author: Aristotle

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: The more you know, the more you realize you don't know.
author: Aristotle

quote: Educating the mind without educating the heart is no education at all.
author: Aristotle

quote: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
author: Aristotle

quote: Hope is a waking dream.
author: Aristotle

quote: The whole is greater than the sum of its parts.
author: Aristotle

quote: Pleasure in the job puts perfection in the work.
author: Aristotle

quote: He who has overcome his fears will truly be free.
author: Aristotle

quote: What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: The educated differ from the uneducated as much as the living differ from the dead.
author: Aristotle

quote: The roots of education are bitter, but the fruit is sweet.
author: Aristotle

quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Man is by nature a political animal.
author: Aristotle

quote: Wishing to be friends is quick work, but friendship is a slow-ripening fruit.
author: Aristotle

quote: Courage is the first of human qualities because it is the quality which guarantees the others.
author: Aristotle

quote: To perceive is to suffer.
author: Aristotle

quote: Dignity does not consist in possessing honors, but in deserving them.
author: Aristotle

quote: Happiness is the meaning and the purpose of life, the whole aim and end of human existence.
author: Aristotle

quote: Learning is not child's play; we cannot learn without pain.
author: Aristotle

quote: The aim of art is to represent not the outward appearance of things, but their inward significance.
author: Aristotle

quote: A friend to all is a friend to none.
author: Aristotle

quote: The energy of the mind is the essence of life.
author: Aristotle

quote: The high-minded man must care more for the truth than for what people think.
author: Aristotle

quote: The antidote for fifty enemies is one friend.
author: Aristotle

quote: Poverty is the parent of revolution and crime.
author: Aristotle

quote: Happiness is activity of soul in accordance with perfect virtue.
author: Aristotle

quote: He who cannot be a good follower cannot be a good leader.
author: Aristotle

quote: The good of man must be the end of the science of politics.
author: Aristotle

quote: The life of money-making is one undertaken by compulsion, and wealth is evidently not the good we are seeking.
author: Aristotle

quote: Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention, sincere effort, and intelligent execution.
author: Aristotle

quote: Happiness belongs to the self-sufficient.
author: Aristotle

quote: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: All human beings, by nature, desire to know.
author: Aristotle

quote: Without friends, no one would want to live, even if he had all other goods.
author: Aristotle

quote: The greatest virtues are those which are most useful to other persons.
author: Aristotle

quote: Happiness is a state of activity.
author: Aristotle

quote: To be conscious that we are perceiving or thinking is to be conscious of our own existence.
author: Aristotle

quote: Good habits formed at youth make all the difference.
author: Aristotle

quote: All men by nature desire knowledge.
author: Aristotle

quote: The ideal man bears the accidents of life with dignity and grace, making the best of circumstances.
author: Aristotle

quote: The law is reason, free from passion.
author: Aristotle

quote: Education is an ornament in prosperity and a refuge in adversity.
author: Aristotle

quote: Friendship is essentially a partnership.
author: Aristotle

quote: Criticism is something we can avoid easily by saying nothing, doing nothing, and being nothing.
author: Aristotle

quote: Democracy is when the indigent, and not the men of property, are the rulers.
author: Aristotle

quote: The one exclusive sign of thorough knowledge is the power of teaching.
author: Aristotle

quote: The educated mind shows restraint; the ignorant mind shows rashness.
author: Aristotle

quote: Pleasure is the beginning and end of the blessed life.
author: Aristotle

quote: All paid jobs absorb and degrade the mind.
author: Aristotle
